title: Resolve providing for the creation of a commemorative memorial portrait in the Massachusetts State House in honor of State Representative Doris Bunte

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Miranda, a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 2176) of Liz Miranda that provisions be made to establish a commemorative memorial portrait in the Massachusetts State House in honor of State Representative Doris Bunte.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/04/2025 from 11:00 AM-05:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
Resolve reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
